    • computerPlayerTurn

      public static void computerPlayerTurn() throws ServerUnavailableException
      The basic AI implementation. It only shoots at random tiles.
      Throws:
      ServerUnavailableException

    • computerSmartTurn

      public void computerSmartTurn() throws ServerUnavailableException
      A more advanced AI implementation. It starts with shooting at random tiles, but when he hits a ship it will try to sink this ship by shooting neighbouring tiles.
      Throws:
      ServerUnavailableException

    • shootRandomTile

      public static Tile shootRandomTile()
      Shoots at a random tile, if there is a ship on the randomly selected tile return this tile.
      Returns:
      A Tile if the tile that was shot contains a Ship

    • shootTile

      public static void shootTile​(Tile tile, Board board) throws ServerUnavailableException
      Shoots a Tile on a Board and adjusts shipLives and Player points accordingly.
      Parameters:
      tile - - The Tile that to be shot
      board - - The board to which the shooting party belongs to
      Throws:
      ServerUnavailableException

      public static void createGame​(boolean isOnline, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String ip, java.lang.String port)
      Parameters:
      isOnline - whether the match is online
      name - the name of the user
      ip - the ip address the user wants to connect to
      port - the port for which the client needs to connect to
